snippet: The Internal Revenue Service said Friday that it had lost emails from five more workers who are part of congressional investigations into the treatment of conservative groups that applied for tax-exempt status.
abstract: Internal Revenue Service says that it has lost emails from five more workers who are part of congressional investigations into the treatment of conservative groups that applied for tax-exempt status.
lead_paragraph: The Internal Revenue Service said Friday that it had lost emails from five more workers who are part of congressional investigations into the treatment of conservative groups that applied for tax-exempt status.

headline.main: I.R.S. Says It Has Lost More Emails
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Says It Has Lost More Emails
